mapper.select: select b.MEMBER_NAME as memberName , a.COMMENT_NO as commentNo , a.MEMBER_NO as memberNo , a.CONTENT as content , a.REG_DATE as regDate , a.MODIFIED_DATE as modifiedDate , a.ISENABLED as isEnabled from Bd_COMMENT as a inner join Cu_MEMBER as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO where BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into Bd_COMMENT(BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, CONTENT) values(#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{content}')
